add.title: Recognized Sponsor Proof
add.description: Proof that your employer is a 'Recognized Sponsor' by the IND (for Highly Skilled Migrant route).

steps_flow.title: Employer Applies
steps_flow.description: Your employer submits the application for the GVVA (Single Permit) or Highly Skilled Migrant visa to the IND.

steps_flow.title: IND Approval
steps_flow.description: Wait for the IND to approve the application (approx. 2-3 weeks for Highly Skilled, longer for others).

steps_flow.title: Collect MVV
steps_flow.description: Book an appointment at the Dutch Embassy to collect your MVV sticker.

steps_flow.title: Travel & Collect Residence Permit
steps_flow.description: Travel to the Netherlands and collect your residence card from an IND desk.
